00150     public static class ButtonListener7 implements FieldChangeListener {
00151         Citation c;
00152         CitationScreen7 cs7;
00153                     
00154         public ButtonListener7(CitationScreen7 _cs7, Citation _n7){
00155             cs7 = _cs7;
00156             c = _n7;
00157         }
00158                     
00159         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00160             ButtonField btn4 = (ButtonField) field;
00161             if(btn4.getLabel().toString() == "Next"){ 
00162                 cs7.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00163                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen8(c));
00164             }
00165             else if(btn4.getLabel().toString() == "Prev"){
00166                 cs7.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00167                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(cs7);
00168             }   
00169         }
00170     }

00176         public void run() {        
00177                 storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00178                 CitationStore.Save();           
00179         }
00180     };
00181 
00182     private MenuItem getItem7 = new MenuItem("Get", 110, 11) {
00183         public void run() {         
00184                 CitationStore.Restore();
00185                 restoreUIFieldsFromCitation();      
00186         }
00187     };     
00188     
00193     private void storeUIFieldsToCitation()
00194     {
00195         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.BAC, field_bac.toString());
00196         // get the time value and re-convert back to a full date string
00197         //c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.BAC_DATE, (new Date(field_bac_dte.getDate()).toString()));
00198         //c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.BAC_TIME, (new Date(field_bac_tme.getDate()).toString()));
00199         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.BAC_DATE, field_bac_dte.toString());
00200         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.BAC_TIME, field_bac_tme.toString());
00201     }
00202 
00203     
00209     private void restoreUIFieldsFromCitation()
00210     {
00211         field_bac.setSelectedIndex(c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.BAC));
00212          
00213         String temp_date = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.BAC_DATE);
00214         // that's dumb - date.toString() inserts GMT which HttpDateParser can't seem to handle
00215         int startGMT = temp_date.indexOf("GMT ");
00216         int endGMT = startGMT + 4; 
00217         if ( startGMT > 0 )
00218         {
00219                 temp_date = temp_date.substring(0, startGMT) + temp_date.substring(endGMT);
00220         }
00221         long td = HttpDateParser.parse(temp_date);
00222         field_bac_dte.setDate(td);
00223         
00224         String temp_time = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.BAC_TIME);
00225         // that's dumb - date.toString() inserts GMT which HttpDateParser can't seem to handle
00226         startGMT = temp_time.indexOf("GMT ");
00227         endGMT = startGMT + 4; 
00228         if ( startGMT > 0 )
00229         {   // strip 'GMT ' out of the time string
00230                 temp_time = temp_time.substring(0, startGMT) + temp_time.substring(endGMT);
00231         }
00232         long tt = HttpDateParser.parse(temp_time);
00233         field_bac_tme.setDate(tt);
00234     } 
00235
